column5: Just an FYI as I read on another forum that the Morson Shopping Centre will be closing for good as of Jan 31,2009. Came from someone who talked directly to Terry Gill. The marina will still be open and some of the fishing hardware will be moved there. So for anyone who stops there to get supplies should get'em before heading to Morson. Also from what I understand they won't be selling gas at the shopping centre but will still have it at the Marina.
Darn, we usually cross the border too early to pick up extra booze at the Rainy River liquor store. Have always relied on the Morson store.
